description:
A carbon element removes tastes and odours that filters don’t, making your water more palatable. It attaches to the output hose of a GravityWorks system, so no separate processing steps are required.

  • Designed for use with Platypus GravityWorks Systems, but can also be attached to any water filter with output hoses of a similar diameter
name: Platypus GravityWorks Carbon Element
